name: Number Place Sudoku
description:
Welcome to Number Place!. Play & practice Sudoku in your own Sudoku temple 'Number Place'.

Key Features:

· Interactive 3D board, rotate, zoom and view/play from any angle
· 5 Levels of difficulty:
· Very Simple
· Simple
· Easy
· Intermediate
· Expert
· Simple select peg number and place on board
· Stuck?, then take a hint
· Still stuck?, show the solution
· Record your fastest times for each difficulty level
· Make notes on the board to help you solve the puzzle
· Create a puzzle and generate the solution
· Tutorial on how to play
· No Ads or In-App purchases
